Usage: All nodes should receive and process message
For requests directed at EPS, to cycle power, etc.
Should be used to mark the raft of sensor or state data that will be flying around the bus
For commands from 432(s) to reaction wheels
Notes: Could be combined with other ADCS types

Usage: For commands from Bdot controller to magnetorquer controller
Notes: Could be combined with other ADCS types

Usage: Specifies under what conditions the message should be downlinked by COM1
Notes: Options include a) never, b) only when overhead our ground station, and c) whole-earth orbit
